cv.profile: I am an experienced IT professional, with excellent analytical and problem solving skills. I also have experience mentoring, managing and leading teams and supporting my peers. One of my core values is providing exceptional service. I consider customer satisfaction to be the most important factor in service organisations and I'm drawn to work for organisations that share this same value. I am quick to grasp new concepts and enjoy developing innovative and creative solutions to problems. My working experiences have allowed me to diversify my skills and enhance my capabilities. However, they are not my end goal but rather serve as stepping stone towards having an opportunity to work in a development-oriented organisation where I can demonstrate my potential and passion. I can communicate effectively, both orally and in writing. I was recently involved from start to finish in the planning, design and migration of an entire school network from a Linux environment to a Windows environment.

skills.skills_summary: A large part of my work experience so far has involved working with networks; this has given me a good understanding of the OSI and TCP/IP networking models. Over the last few years I have been studying Software development at undergraduate level and also in my spare time. I have gained basic knowledge and skills in many languages including:

During this time, I have gained a general understanding of software development techniques including: • AGILE, Scrum, Sprint • UML • Object Orientated Programming, Relational database theory, Software testing and Version Control I am also comfortable working across different platforms and familiar with Windows, Mac OSX, Ubuntu, CentOS and Unix operating systems.

qualification.name: DipHE Computing and Information Technology, The Open University
BSc Computing and Information Technology, The Open University

cv.employment_history: • Big City Tech Ltd (2012-2016) Managing director Tech Retail store and internet cafe • Boxlab Ltd (2004-2012) Managing Director I started Boxlab in 2004, the business primarily focused on providing SMEs with I.T solutions, which include services such as: • Tech support • Network and server maintenance and setup • Data backup and disaster recovery • Software, POS, CCTV, Design and Print Solutions • Web Design Boxlab ltd also operated as a retail store offering a wide variety of technology based products and services including: • Computer & mobile phone repairs • Home Networking and Automation solutions • Computer and mobile phone sales and accessories
cv.interests: I am a social person with a passion for life; I enjoy living clean and healthy. In my spare time I love learning about and trying new things. I enjoy good conversation, reading, cooking, sports and martial arts.
